name: hashfingrpnn
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cmnd))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cmnd))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c1, cmnd))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c1, cmnd))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c1 ∈ Mnd)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c1 ∈ Grp → c1 ∈ Mnd)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c1, cmnd))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(# ` c0)∈ ℕ)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c1 ∈ Grp → c1 ∈ Mnd)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cgrp))

comment: A finite group has positive integer size. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
